doc:
Sally Creighton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sally_Creighton 0 Sally Creighton was an American actress, best known for her roles as Mrs Patricia Gregory on Magic Island, and Mrs Chapman in Howard Hawks' 1951 film, The Thing from Another World. Creighton worked as a dialogue director for films and as a dramatic coach before she became a film actress. Sally_Creighton was an_American_actress , best_known for her_roles as Mrs_Patricia_Gregory on Magic_Island , and Mrs_Chapman in Howard_Hawks '_1951_film , The_Thing from Another_World . Creighton worked as a_dialogue_director for films and as a_dramatic_coach before she became a_film_actress .
